name: Damaged Product - In Stock
description: Customer received a damaged product that is in stock

messages.content: I received my order #ORD12345 yesterday, but the Premium Wireless Headphones are damaged. The packaging was fine but the headphones are cracked.

name: Damaged Product - Out of Stock
description: Customer received a damaged product that is out of stock

messages.content: I received my order #ORD67890 yesterday, but the Smart Fitness Watch is damaged. It looks like it was dropped during shipping.

name: Missing Item
description: Customer reports a missing item from their order

messages.content: I received my order #ORD12345 but one of the Stainless Steel Water Bottles is missing from the package. I checked the packing slip and it should have been included.
I ordered Organic Cotton T-Shirts in my order #ORD54321, but received Wireless Charging Pads instead. The items are completely different from what I ordered.
My order #ORD54321 was supposed to be delivered 10 days ago, but it still hasn't arrived. Can you help me figure out what's going on?
The Premium Wireless Headphones I received in order #ORD12345 are defective. They don't work at all when I try to use them.
